#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    unsigned long long int e,o,mid;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>e>>o;
        if((e+o)%5!=0)
            cout<<-1<<endl;
        else
        {
                mid=(e+o)/2;
                cout<<abs(mid-e-mid/5)<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
